name: Ear Cat Lite - Ear Training
description:
Ear Cat Lite is a fun game created to develop your musical ear, with 20 levels that get progressively more challenging.

From the creators of Melody Cats. (Rhythm Cat, Treble Cat, Bass Cat).

An intuitive approach to recognising intervals.
Improve your solfege and learn to identify pitches in relation to a tonal center.

Helpful and entertaining, Ear Cat has been developed in collaboration with professional musicians and educators.
